attributes.action: Track prisoners who are released early
attributes.additional_details:
In order to be released early prisoners should be electronically tagged so the police are aware of their location at all times until they have proven they are no longer a danger to society.

This would enable the police to know where those convicted of burglary are, and if a burglary is reported we can check if they were in the same location at that time.

It would enable them to see if convicted paedophiles are in the vicinity of a school.

The tag would be a similar form to the current electric tag, but would track released prisoners when they are outside and the police would be able to pinpoint their location at all times.
